title: "There was a problem updating League of Legends..."

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body: Just downloaded the alpha, first time opening it this appears. If I click restart it closes and comes up with the exact same error. I have to end the process in order to close it, the X doesn't work and it doesn't appear in task manager.

replies.body: Also happening to me. It seems to be an endless loop... I can no longer log in through the Alpha Client...

I am also having this problem, on two devices where it stops after downloading 42.9MB. Worst part is I can't even end the window with task manager without it reappearing with the same problem seconds later.
Same here at the same percentage aswell 42.9 mb everytime
the same thing is happening to me
